post_created_at:
Five years ago  we suffered the deadliest attack affecting the LGBTQ+ community in our history. Within minutes  Pulse Nightclub turned from a place of acceptance and joy to a place of unspeakable pain.

As we remember those we lost  we must recommit to honoring them with action.

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at: As the First Lady says: Any nation that out-educates us will out-compete us. That’s why we’re working to pass the American Families Plan  which makes historic investments in education. Secretary Cardona sat down with teachers to discuss how it’ll help them. https://t.co/SMjk9jk45o

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at:
Today’s news shows that folks are feeling better about the economy. And for good reason: growth is near a 40-year high  unemployment is at its lowest level since the pandemic  and wages are on the rise.

Our economic plan is working — and we’re just getting started. https://t.co/y37uvQHzzS

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb

post_created_at: Yesterday I announced that the U.S. will donate half a billion additional Pfizer vaccines to help countries in dire need in this pandemic. In this moment — our values call us to do everything that we can to vaccinate the world against COVID-19. https://t.co/T1XCTgQs1y

It’s the first official day of the G7 Summit here in the United Kingdom. I’m looking forward to reinforcing our commitment to multilateralism and working with our allies and partners to build a more fair and inclusive global economy.
 
Let’s get to work.

Today  I’m announcing that the United States will donate half a billion new Pfizer vaccines to 92 low- and lower middle-income countries. 

These Pfizer vaccines will save millions of lives around the world  and be produced through the power of American manufacturing.

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at: Hello  United Kingdom! https://t.co/Hk5Yspertc

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at:
Diplomacy is essential – because no single nation acting alone can meet the challenges we face today or build the shared future we all seek. 
 
To tackle this century’s most pressing challenges  we have to work together.

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at:
Democracy doesn’t happen by accident. 
 
We have to defend it. 
Strengthen it. 
Renew it. 
 
And I know that the American people are up to this job.

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at:
America is better positioned to advance our national security and our economic prosperity when we bring together like-minded nations to stand with us.
 
Our unrivaled network of alliances and partnerships are a key American advantage.

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at:
Less than 1% of Americans make the choice to serve our nation in uniform.
 
The rest of us — the other 99 percent of us — we owe them.

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at: Tune in as the First Lady and I deliver remarks to US Air Force personnel and their families stationed at Royal Air Force Mildenhall. https://t.co/Dd9d4jfe00

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at:
Since we took office  the unemployment rate has fallen and vaccination rates have soared.

That’s the American Rescue Plan at work.

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at: I’m on my way to the U.K. and Europe today for the first foreign trip of my presidency. I know that democracies can rally together to meet the challenges of this new age – this week  in Europe  we have the chance to prove that.

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at: Folks  Wall Street didn’t build this country — the great middle class built this country. And unions built the middle class.

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at: I’m honored every day to serve as president. https://t.co/uw3rbPxmDV

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at:
When we took office  the economy was in crisis. We got right to work delivering much-needed economic relief — and as a result  more than 40% fewer families struggled to pay for necessities like food  rent  and utilities this spring.

That’s the American Rescue Plan at work.

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at: Folks  the Delta variant — a highly infectious COVID-19 strain — is spreading rapidly among young people between 12 and 20 years old in the U.K. If you’re young and haven’t gotten your shot yet  it really is time. It’s the best way to protect yourself and those you love.

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at: Tomorrow  I depart for Europe on the first foreign travel of my presidency. The trip is about realizing America’s renewed commitment to our allies and demonstrating that democracies can both meet the challenges and deter the threats of this new age. https://t.co/Hq3bFCP3ew

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at:
I’m working hard to find common ground with Republicans when it comes to the American Jobs Plan  but I refuse to raise taxes on Americans making under $400 000 a year to pay for it.

It’s long past time the wealthy and corporations pay their fair share.

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at:
To transgender Americans across the country — especially the young people who are so brave — I want you to know your President has your back.

During Pride Month — and all the time.

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at: With the American Jobs Plan  we’re going to make historic investments in American manufacturing to ensure the future is made right here in America. https://t.co/cvtFnFn0DH

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at:
We’ve made incredible progress in the fight against COVID-19  but we need everyone across the country to pull together to get us over the finish line. Get vaccinated — and encourage your friends and family to get protected as well.

We can do this.

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at:
The U.S. is the only major economy where projections of future growth are stronger today than they were before the pandemic hit in 2020.

America is on the move again — and we can’t stop now.

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at: We’re growing the economy from the bottom up and middle out. Because it’s long past time every American has a fair shot to get ahead.

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at: We’re getting America back on track. https://t.co/mb8gZl7v8W

post_created_at: I met with survivors of the Tulsa Massacre this week to help fill the silence. Because in silence  wounds deepen. And  as painful as it is  only in remembrance do wounds heal. https://t.co/0mLMRAhJiD

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at: Congratulations to the Class of 2021. You’re graduating at an inflection point in our nation’s history – and you have a genuine opportunity to change the trajectory of our country. Seize this moment. I can’t wait to see what you accomplish. https://t.co/pl3Or74lxg

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at:
In our first four months  we’ve created more jobs than any administration in American history.

And we’re just getting started.

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at: Great news folks: we hit record-high health care enrollment. 31 million people now have coverage through the Affordable Care Act. Couldn’t think of a better person to celebrate this milestone with than President Obama  so I gave him a call. https://t.co/QtLeskSNnY

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at: On the 40th year of the HIV/AIDS epidemic  we remember the lives cut short by this terrible disease and celebrate the resilience and dignity of those living with HIV. Let’s continue to eradicate the stigma faced by too many – and work to end this epidemic once and for all.

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at: The long-term unemployment rate has declined the most since 2011 — that’s the American Rescue Plan at work for American families and the American economy. https://t.co/OJp0vzaq7C

post_created_at: This Gun Violence Awareness Day  I’m wearing orange in honor of the Americans killed every day by gun violence and the survivors and families living with the consequences. It’s a public health epidemic — and it’s time we end it. I urge Congress to take action to save lives. https://t.co/B5gzgP3FEs

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at:
Vaccinations are up.
Jobs are up.
Growth is up.
People gaining health care coverage is up.
Small business confidence is up.
 
America is on the move again. https://t.co/amrQBfz7cn

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at:
In my first four months in office  more than two million jobs have been created.  

That's more than double the rate of my predecessor  and more than eight times the rate of President Reagan. https://t.co/kINv4ZwOaP

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at: Tune in as I deliver remarks on the May jobs report. https://t.co/3obHXQb1nj

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at:
Today’s jobs report shows historic progress for American families and the American economy. We added 559 000 jobs in May  created a record two million jobs in our first four months  and unemployment is at its lowest level since the pandemic started.

America is on the move again.

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at: This progress didn’t just happen by chance. We got to this moment because we took aggressive action from day one — with a whole-of-government response. https://t.co/FVLazOIuo8

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at: Unemployment claims are down 50% and 64% of adults are vaccinated since I took office. That’s progress. https://t.co/Ih9yrK5azD

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at: We have a chance  with the investments I’m proposing  to increase the size of our economy by $4.5 trillion over the next decade and win the competition for the future.

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at: The American Jobs Plan will rebuild our nation’s crumbling infrastructure and help tackle the climate crisis head-on. Watch as Ali Zaidi  White House Deputy National Climate Advisor  explains more in 15 seconds or less. https://t.co/z0ms7VelNh

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at: Americans can do anything if we do it together. So  do your part. Give it your all through July 4th — let’s get as many folks vaccinated as possible. https://t.co/s2iNMKmHFq

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at:
Because of our vaccination program and our economic response — America is headed into a summer dramatically different from last year’s.  
 
A summer of freedom.
A summer of joy.  
A summer of get-togethers and celebrations.

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at: America is — and always will be — a nation of immigrants. Our diversity makes us stronger. This National Immigrant Heritage Month  let’s reaffirm and draw strength from that enduring identity and celebrate the history and achievements of immigrant communities around the country.

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at: Today  we announced a month-long effort to pull out all the stops to free ourselves from this virus — and get as many Americans vaccinated as possible by July 4. Find a vaccine near you at https://t.co/4MYpWqXVVo. https://t.co/CkiyywZBXm

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at: Exercise your freedom to live without fear. Get vaccinated.

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at: Today  we are announcing a month-long effort to get 70% of adult Americans vaccinated. It will take everyone doing their part so we can declare our independence from COVID-19 and free ourselves from the grip it has held over our lives.

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at:
In just over four months  thanks to the American people  we have made incredible progress getting people vaccinated.

Nearly 170 million Americans — of every party  every background  every walk of life — have stepped up and rolled up their sleeves to get a shot.

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at: Tune in as I give an update on our COVID-19 response and the vaccination program. https://t.co/4oDkf78IhC

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at:
We know from history that bold investments can raise both the floor and the ceiling of the economy for all of us — it’s why I’ve proposed generational investments like the American Jobs Plan. 
 
It’s what we need today to succeed tomorrow.

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at:
We’re witnessing an all-out assault on our democracy — and we need to act swiftly to protect the sacred right to vote.

We need the For the People Act and the John Lewis Voting Rights Act.

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at:
We can’t just choose to learn what we want to know — and not what we should know.

We memorialize what happened in Tulsa 100 years ago so it can’t be erased.

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at: Tune in as I deliver remarks to commemorate the 100th anniversary of the Tulsa Race Massacre. https://t.co/JLAHnyeyhH

post_created_at: Pride stands for courage  it stands for justice  and most of all it stands for love. As we recall the trials the LGBTQ+ community has endured and celebrate the trailblazers who’ve bravely fought for equality  let us recommit to the work that remains. Happy Pride Month!

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at: We can’t build back better without tackling the systemic racism and disparities that have plagued our nation for far too long. That’s why today  we’re taking additional steps to advance racial equity  narrow the racial wealth gap  and build Black wealth. https://t.co/7mP3mvhSgc

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at: 100 years ago  the thriving Black community of Greenwood in Tulsa  Oklahoma was ruthlessly attacked by a white supremacist mob—as many as 300 Black Americans were killed and 10 000 were left homeless. Today  I’m visiting the Greenwood Cultural Center and meeting with survivors.

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at: Each year  Memorial Day offers us a chance to reflect on the enormity of the sacrifices that generation after generation of Americans has made. https://t.co/yARTptfyO2

post_created_at: On Memorial Day  we honor and reflect upon the courage  integrity  and selfless dedication of the members of our Armed Forces who have made the greatest sacrifice in service to our nation. https://t.co/wRq9hJSxoC

post_created_at:
We have a sacred obligation as a nation to always honor the memory of those we’ve lost — and to support their families.

That is the vow we make each year on Memorial Day.

post_created_at: Midshipman Barber represents the best of this nation — brave  selfless  and dedicated to service. Vice President Harris sat down to hear her story for this week’s conversation. https://t.co/oBALj5FcU0

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at:
Before I took office  independent experts were projecting that the economy would grow at 3 or 4% this year.

Our heart.
Our honor.
Our solid steel spine. 
 
My message to all who serve is simple: thank you.

post_created_at: Before I took office  average initial claims for unemployment insurance were over 830 000 – and this week we learned that those claims have fallen below 460 000 – down by almost half  and at the lowest level we’ve seen since the pandemic struck. https://t.co/ZNXPGFyb13

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at: Before I took office – almost 24 million Americans were going hungry. That number has already dropped by 25%. https://t.co/Jub40zb0kZ

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at: My Administration has created about 1.5 million jobs in our first three months in office – that’s more jobs than have ever been created in the first three months of any presidency in history. https://t.co/x39MeRQHmh

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at: I said from the very beginning: there’s no chance to bring the economy back unless we beat the pandemic. I made the vaccine program a priority – and now 50% of American adults and about 75% of seniors are fully vaccinated. We can’t let up now. https://t.co/9e9t0VrcUy

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at: America is on the move again. We’ve turned the tide on a once-in-a-century pandemic and a once-in-a-generation economic crisis. https://t.co/g8vTzJPTcP

post_created_at:
We have a choice to make. We can keep giving every break in the world to corporations and CEOs. Or  we can ask them to pay their fair share and use that money to make two years of community college free for every student in America.

I know what I choose. https://t.co/ccwgGHjo3R

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at: We have created more jobs in our first three months in office than have ever been created in the first three months of any presidency — about 1.5 million new jobs.

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at: This is our moment to build an economy that rewards work — not just wealth.

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at:
The bottom line is this: The Biden economic plan is working. We’ve had record job creation. We’re seeing record economic growth.
 
We’re creating a new paradigm.

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at:
50% of American adults are now fully vaccinated.
Our economy has added about 1.5 million jobs.
Unemployment claims are down by more than a third — the lowest since the pandemic started.
 
America is on the move again.

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at:
We’ve turned the tide on a once-in-a-generation economic crisis. 

And now we’re faced with a question: what kind of economy are we going to build for tomorrow?

In March of 2020  I went to Cleveland for a campaign event — but our rally was cancelled due to growing concerns about COVID-19. A long dark year lay ahead. 
 
Today  America is on the move again and I’m headed back to talk about our progress. 
 
See you soon  Ohio!

We must do more.

 https://t.co/MVXudLeu8V

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at: We can tackle the climate crisis head-on with a new Civilian Climate Corps. The American Jobs Plan will invest $10 billion to put Americans to work conserving our public lands and waters  bolstering community resilience  and advancing environmental justice.

post_created_at: The American Jobs Plan is a blue-collar blueprint to rebuild America. It’ll invest in American workers and create millions of good-paying  union jobs – 90% of which do not require a college degree.

post_created_at:
It’s never been a good idea to bet against the American people.
 
America is coming back.

He has. https://t.co/gGIKqVIEFk

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at: No one should have to choose between a job and paycheck or taking care of themselves and their loved ones. The American Families Plan will finally provide up to 12 weeks of paid family and medical leave.

post_created_at:
It’s time we invest in the future of America again. The American Jobs Plan will rebuild our crumbling roads and bridges  ensure every American has access to clean drinking water  and bring high-speed internet to every community.
 
Let’s get it done.

post_created_at:

We face an inflection point. We have to act.

Now  we’re creating an average of 500 000 jobs a month and building an economy that works for all — not just those at the top.
 
That’s progress.

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at: Get in folks  we’re going to win the competition for the 21st century. https://t.co/B8YWFKlzeo

post_created_at: Being at Ford’s Rouge Electric Vehicle Center today brought me home. For more than thirty years  my Dad managed car dealerships in Delaware. He would’ve loved visiting this complex  where you feel the history and see the future of an iconic American industry. https://t.co/w6fnqSoK55

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at: As a former public defender  I’ve seen how timely and affordable access to the legal system can make all the difference. But low-income people have long struggled to secure quality access. That’s why today  I took action to expand access to legal representation and the courts.

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at:
Here’s the deal: trickle-down economics has never worked.

It’s time to grow the economy from the bottom up and the middle out.

post_created_at:
When I think of the climate crisis  I think of jobs.

If we act to save the planet we can create millions of jobs  generate significant economic growth  and raise the standard of living of people around the world.

post_created_at: The American Jobs Plan is a blue-collar blueprint to rebuild America. It’s a plan that will leave no one behind. That’s why nearly 90% of the jobs created in the plan do not require a bachelor’s degree.

post_created_at:

Folks  the rest of the world is moving fast ahead  and we’ve got to step up.

If you’re a firefighter or a teacher  you’re paying a higher tax rate than most of corporate America. It’s unacceptable. I’m sick and tired of corporations not paying their fair share.

We’re going to change that.

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at:
With 90% of Americans living within five miles of a vaccination center  it’s never been easier to get your COVID-19 shot. Head to https://t.co/4MYpWqXVVo today to find a location near you.

Get vaccinated  folks.

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at: For working families with children  this tax cut sends a clear message: help is here. https://t.co/hO9gCrpvil

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at: On this International Day Against Homophobia  Transphobia  and Biphobia  the message from the United States is clear: everyone deserves dignity and equality  no matter who they are or whom they love. We’re committed to advancing LGBTQ+ rights here at home and around the world.

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at:
America will never be fully safe while this pandemic is raging globally. That’s why today  I’m announcing that over the next six weeks we will send 80 million vaccine doses overseas.
 
It is the right thing to do. It is the smart thing to do. It is the strong thing to do.

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at:
When tomorrow’s vaccination numbers come out  they will show that 60% of American adults have received at least one shot.
 
Every day  the light at the end of the tunnel grows brighter.

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at: Tune in as I give an update on COVID-19 vaccinations. https://t.co/YBSV8JgDHp

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at:
Over one million Americans have signed up for health insurance during our special open enrollment period. That’s a big deal.
 
Join them and head to https://t.co/gRX1fGFEzj to sign up before August 15.

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at:
I refuse to stand by and let America fall behind while other nations race ahead.

It’s time we invest in our future again. It’s time for the American Jobs Plan.

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at:
We’ve made incredible progress in the fight against COVID-19  but we’re not done yet. Get vaccinated and then ensure your family  friends  and neighbors do as well.
 
Let’s finish strong  folks.

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at: We need reliable  resilient infrastructure if we’re going to compete in the 21st century. We need the American Jobs Plan.

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at:
Last week I had the chance to meet with Dreamers in the Oval Office. These young people are part of the fabric of our nation and vital to our future.

Congress needs to pass the U.S. Citizenship Act and create a path to citizenship for Dreamers  farm workers  and TPS holders now. https://t.co/c3nBdO6elO

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at:
If you're fully vaccinated  you can now go mask-less in most settings.

But remember: it’s going to take time for everyone who wants to get vaccinated to get their shots  and some vaccinated people prefer masks. So please  if you see someone with a mask  treat them with kindness. https://t.co/IRcYe2El4e

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at: Every day  we ask a great deal of those who serve in our nation’s law enforcement agencies. As we recognize Peace Officers Memorial Day and Police Week  my Administration is committed to doing everything we can to support the men and women who serve. https://t.co/nxyjKAso4g

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at: I know folks have a lot of questions about COVID-19  the vaccines  and the latest mask guidance. So  we had the nation’s top experts break things down for this week’s conversation. Check it out: https://t.co/hkRydyEuHe

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at:
It’s long past time Congress pass the U.S. Citizenship Act. 

Dreamers  farm workers  and TPS holders deserve a path to citizenship. Full stop.

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at: Since the start of our Administration  we’ve created over 1.5 million jobs. We’ve come a long way  but the truth is we still have further to go. Congress needs to pass the American Jobs Plan which will create millions of good-paying jobs rebuilding our nation’s infrastructure.

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at:
This is our moment to build an economy that works for everyone — not just the super-wealthy and giant corporations. 
 
Let’s get it done.

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at: After a long year of sacrifice  Americans who are fully vaccinated can stop wearing masks in most settings. We have more to do — but this is great news. https://t.co/s6hPCYKJrG

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at:
Folks  if you’re fully vaccinated — you no longer need to wear a mask.

If you’re not vaccinated yet — go to https://t.co/4MYpWqXVVo to find a shot  and mask up until you’re fully vaccinated. https://t.co/qcyG2WyCG2

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at: As the holy month of Ramadan comes to an end  Jill and I send our warmest greetings to all those celebrating Eid. May you be well throughout the year. Eid Mubarak. https://t.co/LqXDIAOwHc

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at:
The rule is now simple: get vaccinated or wear a mask until you do.  

The choice is yours.

post_created_at: Just a few hours ago  the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention  the CDC  announced that they are no longer recommending that fully vaccinated people need to wear masks – whether inside or outside.

post_created_at: The extraordinary measures my Administration has taken  we estimate  sent enough fuel to gas stations to fill the tanks of over five million vehicles in the last few days.

coordinates: 46th President of the United States  husband to @FLOTUS  proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/IURuMIrzxb
post_created_at: My Administration has mobilized a whole-of-government response to get more fuel quickly and safely to where it is needed and to limit the pain being felt by American consumers.

Tomorrow we will cross 250 million vaccine shots administered since we took office. 

It’s a truly remarkable achievement for the nation.

It’s one more giant step in our fight against the pandemic.

We’re committed to working together to build back better for the American people. https://t.co/EaR5vwPoaj
